items.sentence: Tom picked up the paper and read what was on it.
We\'ll probably never know what happened to Tom.
We\'ve been working on this problem all weekend.
We\'ve decided not to stay in Boston any longer.
You\'re not the only one who uses this computer.
You\'re probably tired after such a long flight.
You\'re the best thing that ever happened to me.
You\'re the one who knows how to do this, right?
I want to thank you for everything you\'ve done.
I wanted to go somewhere I\'d never been before.
That\'s the most beautiful ship I\'ve ever seen.
I\'m not the kind of person that you think I am.
I\'m sorry to hear that your father passed away.
I\'ve been looking forward to meeting you again.
I have been to the airport to see my father off.
I have been to the airport to see my friend off.
I\'ll never forget the day I fell into the well.
I\'ll see if Tom wants to come over for a visit.
I\'ll speak to Tom about what we just discussed.
When I get through with my work, I\'ll call you.
